metatag.home-title: Agenda of activities in the Basque Country
metatag.home-description: kulturekintzak.eus, is the agenda of sporting and cultural events organized in the Basque Country. In addition to creating your user and expanding actions of the surroundings, you can complete information about other initiatives and leave opinions and comments about them. Take the opportunity!
metatag.home-keywords: sports, action, comment, reaction, culture, Basque Country, activities, agenda
metatag.map-title: Location of actions in the Basque Country on map
metatag.map-description: The geographical location of all cultural and sports activities of the Basque Country is visible on the map. Here, you can see and filter your favorite activities using different criteria. Find the best events in one click!

auth-form.name: Name
auth-form.sign-up-sign-in-link: Do you already have an account? Sign in!
auth-form.guard-error: You must be logged in to view that page.

comment.deleted-text: The user has deleted the comment.

validation.compare-date-validation: The final date must be greater than the start date.
validation.name-validation: Name must not have any special characters.
validation.username-validation: Username must not have sapaces and any special characters.
validation.email-validation: This must be a valid e-mail.
validation.password-valid: Must have at least one uppercase, lowercase, special character, and number.
validation.title-validation: Title must not have any special characters.
validation.url-validation: It has to be a valid url address.
validation.coordinator-validation: Coordinator must not have any special characters.
validation.entityName-validation: Entity name must not have any special characters.

Esta informaciÃ³n se elimina cada 24 horas y al caducar, el usuario tendra que iniciar sesiÃ³n otra vez. Usted puede eliminar las cookies en cualquier momento desde su ordenador.
